text: Maps is the debut release by Ohio/Detroit-based pop punk band Mixtapes. The album was recorded over one weekend and released for free on Death to False Hope Records. It was later re-released in November 2011 on vinyl via Animal Style Records, featuring the 10 songs from Maps and a newly recorded EP titled Companions. The album was re-titled Maps & Companions. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== *Ryan Rockwell - vocals, guitar, keyboard, bass *Maura Weaver - vocals, guitar ===Other musicians=== *Tim Rengers from Fireworks (punk band) - drums ==References== Category:2010 debut albums
title: Maps (Mixtapes album)
